page.title: 10CHANGES IN LITTLEMILL
page.content: We interviewed Mr.John Brown who is our school janitor.He has lived in the area for 60 years.He told us that the biggest change which he had noticed was that the village and surrounding area was now sparsely populated where as when he was a boy the community had been a thriving one.This change appears to be due to the closure of the local pits.Mr.Brown lives in a cottage called the Castle.It got its name when the local gamekeeper lived there because he was a very important person to the local people.Mr.Brown enjoys living there because he keeps greyhounds for a hobby and obviously they need a lot of space.Mr.Brown and his wife who is our dinner lady,were married in the school by the Rev. Blackadder who was the minister of the parish of Coylton at that time.
